question: How It Works
answer: Accept your LRAP Award and enroll at Seattle Pacif c University in the 2023 - 2024 academic year. After graduating with a bachelor's degree, if you are earning less than $46,000, we will reimburse you for some or all of your covered student loan payments

question: Covered Loans
answer: LRAP covers all Federal student and parent PLUS loans, as well as private alternative loans, up to $17,000 per academic year and $70,000 in total.

question: After Graduation
answer: To qualify for reimbursement, you must obtain employment, working 30+ hours per week across any number of jobs, in any field.It does not even need to be related to your degree. Assistance then continues until you earn more than $46,000 or your loans are fully repaid.
